    • Constructor Detail

      • RmiGui

        public RmiGui(javafx.stage.Stage fromLogin,
              java.lang.String username,
              RemoteController controller,
              boolean singleplayer)
       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Constructor for RmiGui.
        Parameters:
        fromLogin - is the Stage where the login scene was showed.
        username - is the name of the GUI owner.
        controller - is a controller with rmi connection.
        singleplayer - is true if the GUI refers to a single player match, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException
